sentences.english: I haven"t time to see the film-----besides, it"s had dreadful reviews.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有時間去看這部影片，再說，影評也諸多貶斥。

sentences.english: An actor has to learn to laugh off bad reviews.
sentences.chinese: 演員要學會能對貶斥性評論一笑置之的本領。

sentences.english: He strongly despises and denounces hypocrites and villains, and encourages the Noble Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他特別蔑視和貶斥鄉原與小人，大力提倡浩然正氣。

sentences.english: After the middle period of the Western Han Dynasty, the Confucianism and the Confucians had been once oppressed and denounced.
sentences.chinese: 西漢中期以後，儒家思想和儒士曾一度受壓抑和貶斥。

sentences.english: The play was killed by bad reviews.
sentences.chinese: 那齣戲被貶斥的評論扼殺了。

sentences.english: Why should the nationalistic sentiments of the Han people be reviled?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼中國人的民族主義應該被貶斥？
